item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X 🎬
item.description:
Oh, saving all souls? Just another thing this bunch is willing to fight for starting April 17th UTC!
☄️Ryze 💥Soul Fighter Ryze 💥Soul Fighter Lucian 💥Soul Fighter Wukong 💥Soul Fighter Garen 💥Prestige Soul Fighter Irelia
